Operation 'get_/v3/rates' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. The current description is incomplete for AI agent usability. It doesn't clarify what types of rates are available (fiat vs cryptocurrency), the standardization in USD, or the data source. Added context about rate types, USD standardization, filtering capability, and data source to help agents understand the operation's full scope and when to use it.

data.current_description: Retrieve a list of all conversion rates or filter by comma-separated slugs
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve all available conversion rates or filter by specific currency slugs. Returns a list of fiat and top cryptocurrency rates standardized in USD. Supports comma-separated slug filtering for targeted rate retrieval. Fiat rates are sourced from OpenExchangeRates.org.
data.reasoning: The current description is incomplete for AI agent usability. It doesn't clarify what types of rates are available (fiat vs cryptocurrency), the standardization in USD, or the data source. Added context about rate types, USD standardization, filtering capability, and data source to help agents understand the operation's full scope and when to use it.

message: Operation 'get_/v3/rates/{slug}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. The current description lacks specificity about what 'details' are returned and doesn't explain the USD standardization or clarify the types of currencies supported. Enhanced description specifies the return value structure, USD standardization, supported currency types, and provides guidance on when an AI agent should use this endpoint versus the bulk endpoint.

data.current_summary: Retrieve a conversion rate by slug
data.current_description: Retrieve details for a specific conversion rate by its slug
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve conversion rate details for a specific currency by its slug identifier. Returns rate information for the requested fiat or cryptocurrency, with all prices standardized in USD. Use this endpoint for single-currency rate lookups when you need detailed conversion data for a specific asset.
data.reasoning: The current description lacks specificity about what 'details' are returned and doesn't explain the USD standardization or clarify the types of currencies supported. Enhanced description specifies the return value structure, USD standardization, supported currency types, and provides guidance on when an AI agent should use this endpoint versus the bulk endpoint.

message: Operation 'get_/v3/assets' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_context. Description lacks domain context about what asset data represents (volume-weighted prices, USD standardization) and what fields are returned. Adding this context helps AI agents understand the data quality and use cases. Summary is adequate.

data.current_description: Retrieve a list of assets with optional filters and pagination.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a paginated list of cryptocurrency assets with volume-weighted average prices in USD. Supports filtering and sorting options. Each asset includes current price, market cap, volume, and change metrics. Prices are calculated from exchange ticker data weighted by trading volume.
data.reasoning: Description lacks domain context about what asset data represents (volume-weighted prices, USD standardization) and what fields are returned. Adding this context helps AI agents understand the data quality and use cases. Summary is adequate.

message: Operation 'get_/v3/assets/{slug}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Current description is minimal and doesn't explain what data is returned or the methodology behind the pricing. Enhanced description clarifies the slug parameter usage, return fields, and pricing methodology consistent with the Assets tag documentation.

data.current_description: Retrieve details for a specific asset by slug (id)
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve detailed information for a specific cryptocurrency asset by its slug identifier. Returns the asset's current volume-weighted average price in USD, market capitalization, trading volume, price changes, and supply metrics. Price data is aggregated from exchange tickers weighted by volume.
data.reasoning: Current description is minimal and doesn't explain what data is returned or the methodology behind the pricing. Enhanced description clarifies the slug parameter usage, return fields, and pricing methodology consistent with the Assets tag documentation.

message: Operation 'get_/v3/assets/{slug}/markets' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Description lacks detail about what market data includes and its purpose. Enhanced version explains the relationship to exchanges, what fields are returned, and the 'updated' timestamp mentioned in the Markets tag documentation, improving AI agent understanding of when to use this endpoint.

data.current_summary: Retrieve markets for a specific asset
data.current_description: Retrieve market details for a specific asset by slug (id)
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve market data for a specific asset across exchanges by slug identifier. Returns exchange-specific trading pairs, volumes, prices, and liquidity information for the asset. Includes timestamp indicating when market data was last updated. Useful for understanding where and how the asset is traded.
data.reasoning: Description lacks detail about what market data includes and its purpose. Enhanced version explains the relationship to exchanges, what fields are returned, and the 'updated' timestamp mentioned in the Markets tag documentation, improving AI agent understanding of when to use this endpoint.

message: Operation 'get_/v3/assets/{slug}/history' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Current description is too minimal. Enhanced version clarifies that this provides time-series data with filtering capabilities, explains the use case for historical analysis, and indicates what data points are returned. This helps AI agents understand when to use this endpoint versus the current asset endpoint.

data.current_summary: Retrieve historical data for a specific asset
data.current_description: Retrieve historical data for a specific asset by slug (id)
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve historical price and market data for a specific asset by slug identifier. Supports time range filtering and interval selection for granular analysis. Returns timestamped price points, market cap, and volume data. Useful for analyzing asset performance trends and volatility over time.
data.reasoning: Current description is too minimal. Enhanced version clarifies that this provides time-series data with filtering capabilities, explains the use case for historical analysis, and indicates what data points are returned. This helps AI agents understand when to use this endpoint versus the current asset endpoint.

message: Operation 'get_/v3/exchanges' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Description lacks domain context about exchange data and its relationship to other endpoints. Enhanced version references the 'updated' timestamp mentioned in Exchanges tag documentation, clarifies the data scope, and guides AI agents to the Markets endpoint for deeper analysis.

data.current_description: Retrieve a list of exchanges with optional pagination
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a paginated list of cryptocurrency exchanges with high-level information. Each exchange includes metadata, trading volume, and an 'updated' timestamp indicating data recency. Provides transparency into where cryptocurrency is being exchanged. For detailed trading pair and volume information, see the /markets endpoint.
data.reasoning: Description lacks domain context about exchange data and its relationship to other endpoints. Enhanced version references the 'updated' timestamp mentioned in Exchanges tag documentation, clarifies the data scope, and guides AI agents to the Markets endpoint for deeper analysis.

message: Operation 'get_/v3/exchanges/{exchange}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Description is too brief and doesn't explain what details are returned or the significance of the 'updated' field. Enhanced version clarifies return fields, emphasizes data recency transparency, and guides AI agents to related endpoints for more granular market data.

data.current_summary: Retrieve details for a specific exchange
data.current_description: Retrieve details for a specific exchange by its ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve detailed information for a specific cryptocurrency exchange by its identifier. Returns exchange metadata, trading volume, and an 'updated' timestamp indicating when the exchange data was last refreshed. For market-specific data including trading pairs and volumes, use the /markets endpoint.
data.reasoning: Description is too brief and doesn't explain what details are returned or the significance of the 'updated' field. Enhanced version clarifies return fields, emphasizes data recency transparency, and guides AI agents to related endpoints for more granular market data.

message: Operation 'get_/v3/markets' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Description lacks important context about what markets represent and data quality. Enhanced version clarifies that markets show actual trades (not orders), includes the 'updated' timestamp field mentioned in Markets tag documentation, explains the distinction from historical data, and guides AI agents to the candles endpoint for trend analysis.

data.current_description: Retrieve a list of markets with optional filters and pagination
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a paginated list of cryptocurrency trading markets across exchanges with optional filtering. Each market represents actual trades processed on an exchange (not pending orders). Returns trading pair details, volumes, prices, and an 'updated' timestamp for data recency. Use /candles endpoint for historical market performance analysis.
data.reasoning: Description lacks important context about what markets represent and data quality. Enhanced version clarifies that markets show actual trades (not orders), includes the 'updated' timestamp field mentioned in Markets tag documentation, explains the distinction from historical data, and guides AI agents to the candles endpoint for trend analysis.
